languages.text: "Однако мон-кай Ахиллеас... с ним творилось неладное. Он пропадал ночами, и один раз я проследила за ним. Ахиллеас связывался с Маражаем через артефакт, транслирующий приказы хозяина. Так я узнала, что обожженный мон-кай собирается вскоре предать тебя... А это значило, что я могла упустить единственную нить, ведущую к истине о судьбе моего дома. Я... не могла больше ждать. Я убила Ахиллеаса, забрала артефакт и потребовала у Маражая ответов. Он намекнул мне, где искать правду. Ну а дальше тебе и так все известно".

traits.locale_text: "Однако мон-кай Ахиллеас... с ним творилось неладное. Он пропадал ночами, и один раз я проследила за ним. Ахиллеас связывался с Маражаем через артефакт, транслирующий приказы хозяина. Так я узнала, что обожженный мон-кай собирается вскоре предать тебя... А это значило, что я могла упустить единственную нить, ведущую к истине о судьбе моего дома. Я... не могла больше ждать. Я убила Ахиллеаса, забрала артефакт и потребовала у Маражая ответов. Он намекнул мне, где искать правду. Ну а дальше тебе и так все известно".

languages.text: "That mon-keigh Achilleas... There was something wrong about him. He kept disappearing at night, so one day I followed him. Achilleas was contacting Marazhai using an artefact that transmitted his master's orders. That is how I learned that the burnt mon-keigh was about to betray you... Which meant my only chance to discover the fate of my homeworld was about to slip through my fingers. I could not wait any longer. I killed Achilleas, took the artefact, and demanded answers from Marazhai. He hinted at where I could go to look for the truth. You know what happened next."
languages.original_text: "Однако мон-кай Ахиллеас... с ним творилось неладное. Он пропадал ночами, и один раз я проследила за ним. Ахиллеас связывался с Маражаем через артефакт, транслирующий приказы хозяина. Так я узнала, что обожженный мон-кай собирается вскоре предать тебя... Он намекнул мне, где искать правду. Ну а дальше тебе и так все известно".

traits.locale_text: "That mon-keigh Achilleas... There was something wrong about him. He kept disappearing at night, so one day I followed him. Achilleas was contacting Marazhai using an artefact that broadcast his master's orders. This is how I learned the scorched mon-keigh was about to betray you... Which meant I could miss the only chance to discover the fate of my homeworld. I... could not wait any longer. I killed Achilleas, took the artefact and demanded answers from Marazhai. He hinted at where I could go to look for the truth. You know what happened next."

"That mon-keigh Achilleas... There was something wrong about him. He kept disappearing at night, so one day I followed him. Achilleas was contacting Marazhai using an artefact that broadcast his master's orders. This is how I learned the scorched mon-keigh was about to betray you... Which meant I could miss the only chance to discover the fate of my homeworld. I... could not wait any longer. I killed Achilleas, took the artefact and demanded answers from Marazhai. He hinted at where I could go to look for the truth. You know what happened next."

Which meant my only chance to discover the fate of my homeworld was about to slip through my fingers. I... could not wait any longer. I killed Achilleas, took the artefact, and demanded answers from Marazhai. He hinted at where I could go to look for the truth. You know what happened next."

Achilleas was contacting Marazhai using an artefact that transmitted his master's orders. That is how I learned that the burnt mon-keigh was about to betray you... Which meant my only chance to discover the fate of my homeworld was about to slip through my fingers. I... could not wait any longer. I killed Achilleas, took the artefact, and demanded answers from Marazhai. He hinted at where I could go to look for the truth. You know what happened next."

languages.text: “但那个叫阿吉里亚斯的猴子……我发现他不太对劲。他总是在晚上不知去向，于是我便跟踪了他。我看到阿吉里亚斯拿出来与他的主人联络的装置，与玛拉斋取得了联系。我就是通过这样的方式，得知那个被烧伤的猴子打算背叛你……那一刻我也意识到，我发现家园真相的唯一机会即将从我指间溜走。我……我没法继续等下去了。于是我杀了阿吉里亚斯，夺走了那个装置。我要求玛拉斋告诉我答案，而他暗示我下一步可以去哪里找到真相。再后来的事情，你就都知道了。”
languages.original_text: "That mon-keigh Achilleas... There was something wrong about him. He kept disappearing at night, so one day I followed him. Achilleas was contacting Marazhai using an artefact that transmitted his master's orders. That is how I learned that the burnt mon-keigh was about to betray you... Which meant my only chance to discover the fate of my homeworld was about to slip through my fingers. I could not wait any longer. I killed Achilleas, took the artefact, and demanded answers from Marazhai. He hinted at where I could go to look for the truth. You know what happened next."

languages.original_text: "That mon-keigh Achilleas... There was something wrong about him. He kept disappearing at night, so one day I followed him. Achilleas was contacting Marazhai using an artefact that transmitted his master's orders. That is how I learned that the burnt mon-keigh was about to betray you... Which meant my only chance to discover the fate of my homeworld was about to slip through my fingers. I... could not wait any longer. I killed Achilleas, took the artefact, and demanded answers from Marazhai. He hinted at where I could go to look for the truth. You know what happened next."

languages.text: «Ese mon-keigh, Achilleas... había algo extraño en él. Desaparecía todas las noches, de modo que un día le seguí. Achilleas se ponía en contacto con Marazhai a través de un artefacto que transmitía las órdenes de su señor. Así fue como descubrí que el mon-keigh calcinado estaba a punto de traicionarte... y que, por tanto, mi única oportunidad de descubrir el destino de mi mundo natal se iba a escapar de mis manos. No podía esperar más. Maté a Achilleas, tomé el artefacto y exigí respuestas a Marazhai. Indicó dónde podía ir para encontrar la verdad. Ya sabes lo que ocurrió después».
languages.original_text: "That mon-keigh Achilleas... There was something wrong about him. He kept disappearing at night, so one day I followed him. Achilleas was contacting Marazhai using an artefact that transmitted his master's orders. That is how I learned that the burnt mon-keigh was about to betray you... Which meant my only chance to discover the fate of my homeworld was about to slip through my fingers. I could not wait any longer. I killed Achilleas, took the artefact, and demanded answers from Marazhai. He hinted at where I could go to look for the truth. You know what happened next."

traits.locale_text: «Ese mon-keigh, Achilleas... había algo extraño en él. Desaparecía todas las noches, de modo que un día le seguí. Achilleas se ponía en contacto con Marazhai a través de un artefacto que transmitía las órdenes de su señor. Así fue como descubrí que el mon-keigh calcinado estaba a punto de traicionarte... y que, por tanto, mi única oportunidad de descubrir el destino de mi mundo natal se iba a escapar de mis manos. No podía esperar más. Maté a Achilleas, tomé el artefacto y exigí respuestas a Marazhai. Indicó dónde podía ir para encontrar la verdad. Ya sabes lo que ocurrió después».

languages.text: 「あのモン＝ケイ、アキレアスは…何か様子がおかしかった。夜な夜な姿を消したから後をつけてみたのだ。アキレアスは主人の命令を伝えるアーティファクトを使ってマラズハイと連絡を取っていた。それで、あの焼けたモン＝ケイがお前を裏切ろうとしていることを知ったのだ。つまり、母星の運命を知る唯一のチャンスが、我の指をすり抜けようとしていたというわけだ。我は…待つことは出来なかった。アキレアスを殺してアーティファクトを奪い、マラズハイに答えを求めた。奴は我が真実を探しに行ける場所を示唆した。それからどうなったかは知ってのとおりだ」
languages.original_text: "That mon-keigh Achilleas... There was something wrong about him. He kept disappearing at night, so one day I followed him. Achilleas was contacting Marazhai using an artefact that transmitted his master's orders. That is how I learned that the burnt mon-keigh was about to betray you... Which meant my only chance to discover the fate of my homeworld was about to slip through my fingers. I could not wait any longer. I killed Achilleas, took the artefact, and demanded answers from Marazhai. He hinted at where I could go to look for the truth. You know what happened next."

traits.locale_text: 「あのモン＝ケイ、アキレアスは…何か様子がおかしかった。夜な夜な姿を消したから後をつけてみたのだ。アキレアスは主人の命令を伝えるアーティファクトを使ってマラズハイと連絡を取っていた。それで、あの焼けたモン＝ケイがお前を裏切ろうとしていることを知ったのだ。つまり、母星の運命を知る唯一のチャンスが、我の指をすり抜けようとしていたというわけだ。我は…待つことは出来なかった。アキレアスを殺してアーティファクトを奪い、マラズハイに答えを求めた。奴は我が真実を探しに行ける場所を示唆した。それからどうなったかは知ってのとおりだ」

languages.text: "Dieser Chem-Pan-Sey Achilleas ... Irgendetwas stimmte nicht an ihm. Er verschwand nachts immer wieder, also folgte ich ihm eines Tages. Achilleas stand mit einem Artefakt, das die Befehle seines Meisters übertrug, mit Marazhai in Verbindung. So habe ich erfahren, dass der verbrannte Chem-Pan-Sey kurz davorstand, Euch zu verraten ... Und meine einzige Chance, das Rätsel vom Niedergang meiner Heimatwelt zu ergründen, war dabei, mir zu entgleiten. Ich ... konnte nicht länger warten. Ich tötete Achilleas, nahm das Artefakt an mich und verlangte von Marazhai Antworten. Er machte Andeutungen, wo ich nach der Wahrheit suchen konnte. Was danach geschah, das wisst Ihr."
languages.original_text: "That mon-keigh Achilleas... There was something wrong about him. He kept disappearing at night, so one day I followed him. Achilleas was contacting Marazhai using an artefact that transmitted his master's orders. That is how I learned that the burnt mon-keigh was about to betray you... Which meant my only chance to discover the fate of my homeworld was about to slip through my fingers. I could not wait any longer. I killed Achilleas, took the artefact, and demanded answers from Marazhai. He hinted at where I could go to look for the truth. You know what happened next."

traits.locale_text: "Dieser Chem-Pan-Sey Achilleas ... Irgendetwas stimmte nicht an ihm. Er verschwand nachts immer wieder, also folgte ich ihm eines Tages. Achilleas stand mit einem Artefakt, das die Befehle seines Meisters übertrug, mit Marazhai in Verbindung. So habe ich erfahren, dass der verbrannte Chem-Pan-Sey kurz davorstand, Euch zu verraten ... Und meine einzige Chance, das Rätsel vom Niedergang meiner Heimatwelt zu ergründen, war dabei, mir zu entgleiten. Ich ... konnte nicht länger warten. Ich tötete Achilleas, nahm das Artefakt an mich und verlangte von Marazhai Antworten. Er machte Andeutungen, wo ich nach der Wahrheit suchen konnte. Was danach geschah, das wisst Ihr."

languages.text: « Ce mon-keigh, Achilleas... Il y avait quelque chose d'étrange chez lui. Après avoir remarqué qu'il disparaissait fréquemment la nuit, j'ai décidé de le suivre et j'ai découvert qu'il était en contact avec Marazhai par le biais d'un artefact qui transmettait les ordres de son maître. C'est ainsi que j'ai appris que le mon-keigh brûlé s'apprêtait à vous trahir... ce qui voulait dire que mon unique chance de savoir ce qui était arrivé à mon monde était sur le point de me filer entre les doigts. Je ne pouvais plus attendre. J'ai donc tué Achilleas, puis je me suis servie de l'artefact pour demander des réponses à Marazhai. Il m'a fait comprendre où aller pour découvrir la vérité, et vous connaissez la suite. »
languages.original_text: "That mon-keigh Achilleas... There was something wrong about him. He kept disappearing at night, so one day I followed him. Achilleas was contacting Marazhai using an artefact that transmitted his master's orders. That is how I learned that the burnt mon-keigh was about to betray you... Which meant my only chance to discover the fate of my homeworld was about to slip through my fingers. I could not wait any longer. I killed Achilleas, took the artefact, and demanded answers from Marazhai. He hinted at where I could go to look for the truth. You know what happened next."

traits.locale_text: « Ce mon-keigh, Achilleas... Il y avait quelque chose d'étrange chez lui. Après avoir remarqué qu'il disparaissait fréquemment la nuit, j'ai décidé de le suivre et j'ai découvert qu'il était en contact avec Marazhai par le biais d'un artefact qui transmettait les ordres de son maître. C'est ainsi que j'ai appris que le mon-keigh brûlé s'apprêtait à vous trahir... ce qui voulait dire que mon unique chance de savoir ce qui était arrivé à mon monde était sur le point de me filer entre les doigts. Je ne pouvais plus attendre. J'ai donc tué Achilleas, puis je me suis servie de l'artefact pour demander des réponses à Marazhai. Il m'a fait comprendre où aller pour découvrir la vérité, et vous connaissez la suite. »

languages.text: "Şu Achilleas denen mon-keigh... Onda bir terslik sezmiştim. Geceleri gözden kaybolup duruyordu, ben de bir gün peşine takıldım. Meğerse bir eser aracılığıyla Marazhai'la irtibat kuruyor, efendisinden emirler alıyormuş. O kavruk mon-keighin sana ihanet edeceğini işte böyle öğrendim. Ki bu da ana yurdumun akıbetini öğrenmek için yegâne şansımın elimden kaçmakta olduğu anlamına geliyordu. Daha fazla bekleyemezdim. Achilleas'ı öldürdüm, eseri kaptım ve Marazhai'dan açıklama talep ettim. Bana hakikati aramak için nereye gitmem gerektiğini çıtlattı. Daha sonra olanları biliyorsun zaten."
languages.original_text: "That mon-keigh Achilleas... There was something wrong about him. He kept disappearing at night, so one day I followed him. Achilleas was contacting Marazhai using an artefact that transmitted his master's orders. That is how I learned that the burnt mon-keigh was about to betray you... Which meant my only chance to discover the fate of my homeworld was about to slip through my fingers. I could not wait any longer. I killed Achilleas, took the artefact, and demanded answers from Marazhai. He hinted at where I could go to look for the truth. You know what happened next."

traits.locale_text: "Şu Achilleas denen mon-keigh... Onda bir terslik sezdim. Geceleri gözden kaybolup duruyordu, ben de bir gün peşine takıldım. Achilleas, efendisinin emirlerini ileten bir eser aracılığıyla Marazhai'la irtibat kuruyordu. O kavruk mon-keigh'in sana ihanet edeceğini işte böyle öğrendim. Bundan tek bir anlam çıkıyordu, ana yurdumun akıbetini öğrenmek için yegâne şansımı elimden kaçırmak üzereydim. Ben... Daha fazla bekleyemezdim. Achilleas'ı öldürdüm, eseri kaptım ve Marazhai'dan açıklama talep ettim. Bana hakikati aramak için nereye gitmem gerektiğini çıtlattı. Daha sonra olanları biliyorsun zaten."
